Hero.title: Transform Your Bussiness with Smart QR Menus & Online Ordering
Hero.subtitle: Instantly set up your interactive QR menu and ordering system ‚Äî with our powerful AI, transform your printed menu into a digital menu in minutes!

WhyUs.title: Why scanby?
WhyUs.subtitle: We let you create, launch, and manage everything on your own‚Äîno business or third-party intervention needed, in a matter of minutes.

1.title: Create & Customize Instantly
1.subtitle: Upload a photo or PDF of your printed menu, and we‚Äôll instantly turn it into a digital version using AI‚Äîno technical skills required.

2.title: Customizable & Multilingual
2.subtitle: Tailor your menu to fit your brand and serve customers in up to 30 languages with full multilingual support.

3.title: Seamless Managing
3.subtitle: Update your menu, prices, and items instantly‚Äîno middlemen, no delays. Manage everything seamlessly from your own dashboard, anytime you want.

4.title: Start for Free ‚Äì No Credit Card Required
4.subtitle: Get 200 free scans to test out your menu with no upfront commitment!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Can't find the answer you are looking for?¬†Reach out to us
faq.description: Feel free to reach out to us for any questions and we will get back to you as soon as possible!

faq1.question: How does the Scanby QR menu work exactly?
faq1.answer: Once you upload your menu, Scanby generates a unique QR code for your business. Simply print it and place it on your tables, counters, or menus. Customers scan it with their smartphone camera and instantly view your digital menu‚Äîno app downloads required, just instant access.

faq2.question: Can customers place orders directly through the QR menu?
faq2.answer: Absolutely! With our QR Menu + Ordering feature, customers can browse your digital menu, select their items, and place their orders straight from their phones. Orders show up instantly on your Scanby dashboard for you to manage, accept, and prepare.

faq3.question: Is it difficult to set up? I‚Äôm not very tech-savvy.
faq3.answer: Not at all! Scanby is designed for everyone‚Äîeven if you have zero technical experience. Setup takes minutes, and you can easily manage your menus, orders, and settings from our intuitive, user-friendly admin dashboard.

faq4.question: Can I update my menu after it‚Äôs live?
faq4.answer: Yes! You have full control to update your digital menu anytime. Whether it's adding a new item, adjusting prices, or highlighting specials, all changes happen in real-time‚Äîyour customers always see the freshest version.

faq5.question: Can I use Scanby if I run multiple locations or franchises?
faq5.answer: Definitely! Scanby lets you manage multiple venues from a single account. Each location gets its own menu, QR codes, and settings‚Äîall organized neatly in your dashboard.

faq6.question: What happens if I need help setting everything up or troubleshooting?
faq6.answer: We‚Äôve got your back! Scanby offers easy-to-follow setup guides, tutorial videos, and a friendly support team ready to assist you whenever needed. Our goal is to make your onboarding smooth and stress-free.

faq7.question: What devices do customers need to use Scanby QR menus?
faq7.answer: Customers just need a smartphone with a camera‚Äîno apps or special software needed. Our QR codes work universally with iPhones and Androids.

faq8.question: Is the menu customizable to match my restaurant‚Äôs brand?
faq8.answer: Yes! With Scanby, you can customize fonts, colors, menu layouts, and even add your logo. Create a digital menu that truly fits your venue‚Äôs unique style.

faq9.question: Is the QR sticker customizable to match my business's brand?
faq9.answer: Of course! Scanby lets you asjust colors, shapes, and even add your logo to the QR code.

faq10.question: Can i use Scanby for my self service business?
faq10.answer: Yes! Scanby supports a full self-service experience. Clients can scan, order and receive notification when their order is ready. No waiting or long queues.

Effortless Digital Menu from Images & PD.title: Effortless Digital Menu from Images & PDFs!
Effortless Digital Menu from Images & PD.desc: Instantly convert your photo or PDF menu into a digital menu with AI-powered accuracy. No manual entry‚Äîjust upload and let AI do the work!

Customizable Themes.title: Customizable Themes
Customizable Themes.desc: Tailor your digital menu with our easy-to-use color theme maker to reflect your business's identity. Ensure a visually appealing experience for your guests.

Real-Time Dashboard.title: Real-Time Dashboard
Real-Time Dashboard.desc: Effortlessly update menu items, descriptions, and prices with just a few clicks. No need to reprint menus‚Äîchanges reflect instantly across all customer devices.

Instant Digital Menu Access.title: Instant Digital Menu Access
Instant Digital Menu Access.desc: Guests simply scan a QR code to view the menu instantly on their smartphones. No app downloads required‚Äîjust fast, convenient, and touch-free browsing.

Multi-Language Support.title: Multi-Language Support
Multi-Language Support.desc: Your menu is automatically translated in up to 30 languages. Guests can switch between languages improving accessibility and customer satisfaction.

Seamless QR Ordering.title: Seamless QR Ordering
Seamless QR Ordering.desc: Guests can browse, select items, and place orders directly from the digital menu.

Real-Time Order Management.title: Real-Time Order Management
Real-Time Order Management.desc: Orders appear instantly in your Admin Dashboard, ensuring smooth operations.

QR Menu.title: QR Menu
QR Menu.longTitle: QR Menu ‚Äì Instant Access, Effortless Browsing
QR Menu.desc: Say goodbye to printed menus and hello to a modern, hassle-free dining experience. With our QR Menu, your customers can simply scan a QR code using their smartphones and instantly access your digital menu‚Äîno downloads, no delays, no apps needed.
QR Menu.shortDesc: Let your customers scan a QR code and instantly access your digital menu‚Äîno apps, no hassle. Keep your menu always up-to-date while reducing printing costs.

steps.step1: Create & Customize Your Digital Menu - Once you create your account and choose your plan, you will be able to add and personalize your menu in no time.
steps.step2: Generate A Unique QR Code - Print and display on booklets, counters, or marketing materials.
steps.step3: Customers Scan & Browse - Customers can instantly access your menu on their phones by scanning the QR code.
steps.step4: Manage Your Menu With Ease - Control through a user-friendly admin panel, where you can update, edit, or remove items in real-time.

Smart Ordering QR Menu.title: Smart Ordering QR Menu
Smart Ordering QR Menu.longTitle: Smart QR Menu ‚Äì Seamless & Effortless Ordering
Smart Ordering QR Menu.desc: Take your QR Menu to the next level by allowing customers to browse, order, and pay directly from their phones. Enhance efficiency, reduce wait times, and improve the overall customer experience.
Smart Ordering QR Menu.shortDesc: Take your QR menu to the next level! Allow customers to browse your menu, place orders ‚Äî all without waiting for a waiter. Faster service, happier customers, and increased efficiency.

steps.step1: Setup The Menu - The interface simplifies the setup of the QR menu, with some extra configuration like stock & quantity or payment integration.
steps.step2: Browse & Select Items - Guests add items to their carts, select preferences, and place the order directly from their phones.
steps.step3: Order Sent To The Admin Panel - The order instantly appears in your admin dashboard, where you can manage and track it in real-time.
steps.step4: Fulfill Order - Once the order is completed by the staff.

Self Service Smart Menu.title: Self Service Smart Menu
Self Service Smart Menu.desc: Enhance your restaurant or caf√© with a QR ordering system! Customers can scan, order from their table, and only pick up their order when it‚Äôs ready‚Äîno waiting, no interruptions. Improve service efficiency while staying in full control.
Self Service Smart Menu.shortDesc: Customers can scan, order from their table, and only pick up their order when it‚Äôs ready‚Äîno waiting, no interruptions. Improve service efficiency while staying in full control.

steps.step1: Set Up Your Online Store - Customize your menu, pricing, and branding by following the exact same steps as setting up a QR menu.
steps.step2: Place Orders For Delivery Or Takeaway - Customers choose their preferred option and complete payment securely online.
steps.step3: Order Sent To The Admin Panel - The order instantly appears in your admin dashboard, where you can manage and track it in real-time.
steps.step4: Prepare & Fulfill Orders - Notify customers when their order is ready for pickup or out for delivery.
